name: Peeblo Quest
description:
Join Peeblo on his quest to gather the seven Super Gems and save the world from an unfathomable evil! He may not have arms, but this little yellow fellow sure packs a punch! Hop, skip , and jump your way through the hordes of small round creatures in this daring platformer!

Over 1/3 of my time was spent working on the ending cutscene so please see it through.
